mapper.select: select GOODS_TYPE_ID AS sortId,TYPE_NUM AS sortBianhao,TYPE_NAME AS sortName,TYPE_SHORTHAND AS sortSuoxie,TYPE_PID AS pid from MATERIAL_TYPE where 1=1
select GOODS_TYPE_ID "id", TYPE_NAME "name", TYPE_PID "pId", DECODE(TYPE_OPEN,0,'false',1,'true') "open", TYPE_ORDER "order", TYPE_LEVEL "level" from MATERIAL_TYPE where 1=1 order by TYPE_ORDER ASC
select GOODS_TYPE_ID AS sortId,TYPE_NAME AS sortName,TYPE_PID AS pid from MATERIAL_TYPE where GOODS_TYPE_ID=#{0}

select GOODS_TYPE_ID "id", TYPE_NAME "name", TYPE_PID "pId", DECODE(TYPE_OPEN,0,'false',1,'true') "open", TYPE_ORDER "order", TYPE_LEVEL "level" from MATERIAL_TYPE where 1=1 and TYPE_PID=#{sortId} order by TYPE_ORDER ASC
